name: XIRIZ: Demo Version
description:
This demo finds you making first contact with the uncharted "planetoid" known as Helio 7 in order to hunt down the recently escaped bio-weapon known as XIRIZ before it evolves beyond comprehension and assimilates all life in the galaxy.

XIRIZ is a proof of concept demo for a 2D action adventure with acrobatic combat and movement. Xbox and PS4 Controllers are supported in addition to keyboard and mouse. In game, the UI primarily utilizes controller icons. A read me file is included with a layout of all the controls for each input method.

As this project is currently in development, I encourage all reviews and feedback! Any and all critiques will help improve the full game's development.
